channel.title: I wrote a poem
channel.description:
Dandelion seed
Remorseful feelings are due to you, because you have been entrusted much ado. Why is it that you’re looked upon with such glee? It is assumed that you feel sympathy. You hear more than enough from one’s mind, I wonder how you are able to confine. When all the torment has been said and told, You are swept from your family into the cold. The wind twists and twirls you around, but all you can hear is the mind’s sorrow sounds. You stumble through the air, trying to find your way, but the sorrow brings you to dismay. The sorrows of one's mind cannot comprehend, and all is lost in an unfortunate end.

item.title: I wrote a poem
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Water droplet

Roses are red, violets are blue
Fuck Dandelions and fuck you to
theyre white like semen, but people keep believin
you blow them out and your future will make like seasons
and change your mind, outcome of your life
hah these wishes, bitch get back to your wife
Your poem is pretty good, if I say so myself
I better not find this shit sitting on a book shelf
You give my teachers ammo, not camo, to assign assign
so much homework IM BLIND IM BLIND

Read full topic

item.title: I wrote a poem
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

Dandelion seed

Remorseful feelings are due to you,
because you have been entrusted much ado.
Why is it that you’re looked upon with such glee?
It is assumed that you feel sympathy.
You hear more than enough from one’s mind,
I wonder how you are able to confine.
When all the torment has been said and told,
You are swept from your family into the cold.
The wind twists and twirls you around,
but all you can hear is the mind’s sorrow sounds.
You stumble through the air, trying to find your way,
but the sorrow brings you to dismay.
The sorrows of one’s mind cannot comprehend,
and all is lost in an unfortunate end.
